summary: InspectionsNew module (Drodat-inspired redesign) - All tests passed. Backend: 13/13 tests passed. Frontend: All features verified working - claim selection, search functionality, Start New Inspection CTA, Inspection History, mobile view with Change Claim button, and classic inspections page at /inspections/classic.
critical_code_review_comments: InspectionsNew.jsx correctly implements mandatory claim selection before capture
Search functionality filters claims by name, claim number, and address
Mobile view properly hides claim list and shows 'Change Claim' button when claim is selected
Start New Inspection CTA with feature pills (Voice Notes, GPS Tagging, AI Reports) displays correctly
Inspection History section shows previous sessions for selected claim
Classic inspections page accessible at /inspections/classic (InspectionsEnhanced component)
Backend /api/inspections/sessions endpoint properly supports claim_id filtering
Backend /api/claims/ endpoint returns all required fields for search/display
seed_data_creation: Created TEST_Inspection sessions during backend testing (auto-cleaned)
context_for_next_testing_agent: InspectionsNew module fully tested. Key routes: /inspections (new Drodat-inspired UI), /inspections/classic (old InspectionsEnhanced). Backend endpoints: /api/claims/ (list claims), /api/inspections/sessions (CRUD for inspection sessions), /api/inspections/presets/rooms and /api/inspections/presets/categories (presets). RapidCapture component handles actual camera functionality - not tested in this iteration as it requires camera access.

Inspections page loads at /inspections.details: Page loads with title 'Inspections', subtitle 'Capture property photos with voice notes', and Select Claim section

Claims list displayed with search.details: 229 claims displayed, search filters by name (Sarah -> 1 result), claim number (CLM-2026 -> 11 results), clearing restores all

Selecting claim shows Start New Inspecti.details: After selecting claim: claim details card, Start New Inspection CTA with Start button, feature pills (Voice Notes, GPS Tagging, AI Reports)

Selecting claim shows Inspection History.details: Inspection History section visible after claim selection, shows 'No previous inspections' for claims without sessions

Mobile view shows Change Claim button.details: On mobile (390x844), selecting claim hides claim list and shows 'Change Claim' button at top, clicking returns to claim list

Classic inspections at /inspections/clas.details: InspectionsEnhanced component loads with Rapid Capture Mode, Single Photo Capture, Room/Area selector, Category buttons

Backend /api/inspections/sessions.details: GET returns sessions list, supports claim_id filter, POST creates new session, PUT completes session

Backend /api/claims/.details: Returns list of claims with id, client_name/insured_name, property_address/loss_location, claim_number
